I am a PhD student at Cornell Information Science advised by Dr Yian Yin. Previously, BS and MS at the Graduate School of Systems and Information Engineering in University of Tsukuba, under the guidance of Dr Yukie Sano. My research interests include Network Science, Science of Science, and Computational Social Science.
